doc.title: One Take Movie
doc.plot: The film shows the preparation of a unique project, The Russian Ark" by Alexander Sokurov (Cannes 2002, in competition), seen "from the inside". The camera of Michal Bukojemski, an experienced director and cameraman, has captured the most important and eloquent instants from Alexander Sokurov's making of "The Russian Ark". The technicians of all the cinema professions are there: from the costume and set designers to the cast and extras.
